long_description: Made from soft, durable acrylic knit, the reversible Burton Belle beanie has a formfitting skully fit and features a solid color on one side and a polka-dot pattern on the other. Soft acrylic knit offers excellent warmth; it also breathes well when you're active and dries quickly when damp. Both sides of the Belle beanie have a Burton logo.
short_description: Made from soft, durable acrylic knit, the reversible Burton Belle beanie has a formfitting skully fit and features a solid color on one side and a polka-dot pattern on the other.
